Recipe.title: Daddyda's Sauce (Ginger Orange Teriyaki Sauce)
Recipe.Description:
We love eating Chinese food. We usually use bottle after bottle of Yoshida's sauce. But one night, we started making Teriyaki chicken and found we didn't have any!
So Ransom decided to try making his own. The first try was excellent, and the second was even better, but the third time topped them all!
Since it is better than Yoshida's sauce, and since it was made by "Daddy," we decided to call it Daddyda's Sauce.

section.instruction:
Put the Soy Sauce and Flour into a pan.
Without heating, mix very well with a wisk until there are absolutely no lumps left.
Add all of the other ingredients and stir well.
Over medium heat, bring to a simmering boil.

Notes.note: This sauce can be used immediately, or it can be placed into a bottle and saved for later. (We usually end up using some and saving some for later.)

We use it in various ways:
Put it over stir-fry vegetables for a wonderful Chinese food dish.
Pour it over rice or noodles.
Use it as a sauce for cooking Teriyaki Chicken.

Modifications.modification: Substitute Very Finely Chopped Onion with ½ Tablespoon Onion Powder.
